Cards.Question: What is the Japanese word for 'Hello'?
What is the Japanese word for 'Thank you'?
What is the Japanese word for 'Yes'?
What is the Japanese word for 'No'?
What is the Japanese word for 'Please'?
What is the Japanese word for 'Excuse me'?
What is the Japanese word for 'I'm sorry'?
What is the Japanese word for 'Good morning'?
Cards.Answer: おはようございます (Ohayou gozaimasu)

Cards.Question: What is the Japanese word for 'Good night'?
What is the Japanese word for 'Good evening'?
What is the Japanese word for 'Good afternoon'?

What is the Japanese word for 'I love you'?

What is the Japanese word for 'I'm hungry'?
Cards.Answer: お腹が空いた (Onaka ga suita)

Cards.Question: What is the Japanese word for 'I'm thirsty'?
Cards.Answer: のどが渇いた (Nodo ga kawaita)
